Articles.Content:
Have you ever wanted to make a realistic spacecraft, but wanted to kerbalize the name? Now you can, with this invention:


  • Mercury Atlas-Moho Atlas
  • Mercury Redstone- Moho Greenstone
  • Space Launch System-Spacier Launch Stage (from HOCGaming))
  • Saturn Rockets I/IB/V- Jool Rockets- I/IB/V

That's all I have for now, if you have anymore, reply and I'll edit the list.
